pageContext.title: In brief: Google Flights launches in Singapore
pageContext.content:
Google Flights has rolled out on Google Search to make it easier for Singaporeans to find travel ideas and search for available flight options. Users can type “Flights to Osaka” or go directly to Google Flights to compare and book flights in Singapore dollars. The feature is available on desktop and mobile.

Source: press release
